website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Micro G Pursuit Twist is a road shoe that was welcomed with open arms. Those who have tried this product stated that they were happy with what it had to offer. Its price was commended for being wallet-friendly, its various width options were coveted, and its versatile construction was considered to be fashion-friendly. On the other hand, there were those who complained about a squeaking sound emitted by the midsole while others felt that the shoe could be more snug and supportive.
pros: Many consumers liked the stylish look of the Under Armour Micro G Pursuit Twist, stating that it was great for casual use
The underfoot cushioning system was lauded for being responsive and supportive
People stated that the price for a pair of these running shoes was very affordable
The inside of the shoe has enough space for natural toe-splay, several testers commented
Runners appreciated the various width options that were available for this shoe as they felt that the choices accommodated many foot types
Some purchasers felt that the overall weight of this product was light enough to handle many kinds of activities, including gym training and all-day walking
Most people observed that the sizing scheme welcomed their usual expectations
cons: Some purchasers complained that the midsole emitted an annoying squeaking sound whenever each step is taken
The instep causes the foot to slip and hit the tip of the toe box, according to a few wearers

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I am not a runner just purchased them for every day walking. Usually wear a size 11 but ordered a 1/2 size up (11 1/2) as reviews suggested. Glad I did, fit is perfect. Very comfortable shoe. Great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym and casual dinner.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Extremely comfortable and very stylish. I've worn them to the gym and to casual dinner with shorts and golf shirt. They're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: christoph d.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but sizes are very small
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe but I wear a men's 15 in any other shoe but this 15 has my toes tight against the end of the shoe. Be sure to order a 1/2 size bigger at the least.
customer_reviews.author: Don Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet stylish,  comfortable & lightweight  ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of UA sneakers ... Very comfortable & lightweight. Easily a 9 out of 10 rating ... would've been a 10, but UA Charged Intakes are even better. These, however, are still very excellent sneakers ... they are very comfortable, fit is spot on and they look great! Certainly comparable to a good pair of Nikes ... and pretty much just as comfortable as Brooks. If you're looking for a comfortable pair of UA's, these and the Charged Intakes are tops. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: They are a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes because they are nice looking and lightweight. I wear a size 15 and I think they are pretty true to size. However, if you have a wide foot you might try and find a different pair. I do have wide feet and the material bulges on the sides of the shoe. I'm just using them to stand and walk so I think they will last a while. If you need performance to run, I'd recommend getting a wider more durable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Ultra light and fit as expected (ideal for running)
customer_reviews.text: When I use this shoe and run, it feels like as if I haven't worn any shoe at all. It is that light ! I ordered size 10 (US) shoe and it fit perfectly well. I am using this shoe since last 2 weeks and I am fully in love with this great product from Under Armour. Would love to order again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Saurav Sahu

customer_reviews.title: Love the stylish look. Order 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I did not listen to others and ordered my typical 11.5. I ended up returning and getting the 12. Much better fit. These shoes have less volume than I am use to but they are really comfortable. I love the look as well. Will probably order a second pair in another color so I can move around.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Tx Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: I can't really review these as running shoes as I mainly wear them as casual sneakers. Very comfortable and fit was like my other UA shoes. I always seem to fit well in 11.5 M UA and Nike shoes. These did seem to need a few days to break in. Initially the arch area was a bit uncomfortable but then felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great price for shoes, looks really nice. Gifted this to my dad as a present and he loved it. He an be tough to shop for but he really enjoyed the shoes, looks nice and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: CTran

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, very light, and quick dry
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It looks great. I got the black and white, its more like gray and white, but still looks good. The fit is great, it's very light and comfortable. Good running shoes, I ran in the rain and afterwards it was very quick to dry. It's breathable. Also very easy to clean. Just wipe and it's all good. Even the white bottom sole is very easy to clean, dirt literally doesn't stick to it. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mindseye

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as hell
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable. I ordered what appeared to be light grey and black, but I ended up with a pair of light grey and navy blue. Although I would’ve wanted it to be black They match my jeans pretty well so I’m not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Men shoe.
customer_reviews.text: First time wearing the Under Armour shoe and I love it. It’s more comfortable comparing to Nike. The size fits perfectly. Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I went to the UA outlet and the shoes there were $129 discounted to $89 plus tax. I got two pairs here for what one would've cost at the outlet. Nice shoe, good look , good fit. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steven Destout

customer_reviews.title: Comfy !
customer_reviews.text: Seems very comfortable for a running shoe so far. Haven’t gone over 5 miles in these shoes but for the shorter runs I haven’t had any bad experiences with these shoes. For the price it’s a very solid shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. The shoes are awesomely comfortable, the style is great looking and they seem quite durable. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: They're very comfortable and good for running. I've been using them for two weeks and didn't have any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these shoes for our 15 year old son. He says theu fit well. They are a very nice looking pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: frank owens

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes very comfortable and a better price then some retail stores
customer_reviews.author: Rich Shaw

customer_reviews.title: They’re awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes! They fit as expected and are supportive! They are light weight and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the fabric & comfortability. Exactly what I wanted & would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Size 1/2 up! I have found that under armor runs about 1/2 size small.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to move away from Nike due to their child slave labor practices, however UA really disappointed. These shoes are not comfortable. The longer I wore them the more uncomfortable they got. Stick to a more established brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe and they fit well length and width wise. I normally wear a 12 and that's what I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DRE

customer_reviews.title: Real comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I walk alot at work everyday and these shoes are great!
customer_reviews.author: Having fun!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Price ok amazon beat everyone in store. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: These ran a little small so I had to return and order next size up. After that these are comfortable walking shoes that worked well hiking uneven streets in Italy
customer_reviews.author: William V Helsley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lite weight
customer_reviews.text: UA is all I’ll buy now. Will not purchase Nike
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe. Bought for my husband and he loves the color and fir!
customer_reviews.author: April Clements

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband’s second pair. He loves them. Delivery was as expected too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Magine

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: After about 5months there is now a hole in the top of one shoe. They are nice just sucks they ended up with a hole in them
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable. I am using it for GYM and it really feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Vivaan

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker for causal wear! Feels like a slipper! Super light
customer_reviews.author: Kduda

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and light weight. They have become my favorite shoes. I will be purchasing a few more colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LMI

customer_reviews.title: Great Gym Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of these shoes and use them as both running and gym shoes. They are great if your are on your feet all day. They could have a little more give in them while running but overall a great shoe and provides a better value than comparable brands.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: nice  shoe
customer_reviews.text: I need to be on my feet along time these provided the comfort and stability I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Joe Zawadzki

customer_reviews.title: Loved them.
customer_reviews.text: They’re awesome. My fiancé loves them. Exactly like the photo. Box was a little crushed up but that could’ve been from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Runs half size to small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice but run about a half size small.My husband wears an 11 but needs 11 1/2 in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great , comfortable shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for the gym and so comfortable as well for walking . Feels like you’re barefoot. Very happy I purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable Feet don't hurt My husband love this shoe
customer_reviews.author: BLUEBIRD

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my husband and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great summer shoe careful in rain tho your feet will be wet unlike my girlfriend
customer_reviews.author: slide

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Changed into these for my primary workout shoes from Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Small

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. Very, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to buy for under Armour shoes
customer_reviews.text: Used it for walking and running, fits perfectly and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Chen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Husband says these are the most comfortable shoes he has owned
customer_reviews.author: Blake Weimer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Micro G Pursuit Twist Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Hit the ground running with the Under Armour® UA Micro G Pursuit Twist running shoes. Predecessor: Micro G Pursuit. Support Type: Neutral. Cushioning: Lightweight, flexible response. Surface: Road. Differential: 8mm. Breathable knit mesh upper. Lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Die-cut EVA footbed with arch support. Micro G® midsole provides lightweight cushioning and energy return with each stride. Rubber outsole provides reliable traction. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9.2 oz Product measurements were taken using size 10, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Lightweight mesh upper delivers complete breathability
Foam padding placed around your ankle collar & under the tongue for an incredibly comfortable fit & feel
High rebound, die cut EVA sockliner built with extended arch support
One piece Micro G foam midsole turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs
